Author: babyfaced-bitch
Text: Idk if YI’s have anything to do with ED’s but my yeast infections lasted about a year and a half before I got it figured out and it happened before I fell back into my ED. I’m not a doctor so I can’t say if it’s because of the ED, but just based on my experience, it might not have anything to do with the ED at all.  For me, I had to go to my gyno A LOT and get a lot of oral meds (that seem to work for everyone else but didn’t ever work for me) until they tried something else and gave me something that was basically a prescription strength monistat.   The healthyhooha sub has lots of info that have helped lots of people through their recurring infections if you wanted to give it a look but honestly, best advice I can give you is “go to a gyno.” They can help you figure out what’s going on and how to fix it better than any of us here can even speculate.

Author: LowCalPal
Text: Yes, eating disorder sufferers are extremely prone to yeast infections.  We tend to inadvertently fuck up our gut bacteria, which allows yeast to grow out of control.
